title: Frontend Web Developer with React
description:
Involved from day one in the development of xMDR, contributing to the frontend design and implementation from project inception through production, delivering a complex data-driven interface for daily SOC operations.
I built reusable components, alert visualization flows, and high-performance dashboards, ensuring scalability and maintainability.
In parallel, we developed an internal component library.
I worked closely with backend, product, and security teams to translate complex requirements into a robust, clear, and efficient user experience.
Tech Stack: Typescript, HTML, Tailwind CSS, React, Nextjs, ReactQuery, Zustand, Zod, Storybook, Vitest, Azure Devops, Copilot.
